attributes.action: take action against a proposal to charge for car parking in Bushey Park, Kingston, Surrey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Access to, and car parking in, Bushey Park, Kingston, has always been free.
To implement car parking charges at this time would seem to be a good way of discouraging people to do the very thing that government health advisors and others are attempting to encourage, that is getting people to take more exercise.
A further major potential problem could be the surrounding roads outside the park becoming clogged with the vehicles of the park visitors.
